trans-unit.source: Message Compiler Properties for Driver Projects
trans-unit.target: Message Compiler Properties for Driver Projects

trans-unit.source: Sets the properties for the [**Message Compiler (MC.exe)**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Aa385638) tool.
trans-unit.target: Sets the properties for the [**Message Compiler (MC.exe)**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Aa385638) tool.

trans-unit.source: The compiler generates the message resource files that you can add to your project.
trans-unit.target: The compiler generates the message resource files that you can add to your project.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the [Event Tracing for Windows (ETW)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff545699) kernel-mode API to add event tracing to a kernel-mode driver, you could use the message compiler to create a header file that contains definitions for the event provider, event attributes, channels, and events.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you are using the [Event Tracing for Windows (ETW)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff545699) kernel-mode API to add event tracing to a kernel-mode driver, you could use the message compiler to create a header file that contains definitions for the event provider, event attributes, channels, and events.

trans-unit.source: You must include this header file in your source code.
trans-unit.target: You must include this header file in your source code.

trans-unit.source: The message compiler creates a resource compiler script (\*.rc) that you add to your project file.
trans-unit.target: The message compiler creates a resource compiler script (\*.rc) that you add to your project file.

trans-unit.source: Setting Message Compiler properties for driver projects
trans-unit.target: Setting Message Compiler properties for driver projects

trans-unit.source: Open the property pages for your driver project.
trans-unit.target: Open the property pages for your driver project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the driver project in **Solution Explorer** and select **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the driver project in **Solution Explorer** and select **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: In the property pages for the driver project, click **Configuration Properties** and then click **Message Compiler**.
trans-unit.target: In the property pages for the driver project, click **Configuration Properties** and then click **Message Compiler**.

trans-unit.source: Set the properties for the project.
trans-unit.target: Set the properties for the project.

trans-unit.source: This property page is available if you add a message text file (.mc) or a manifest (.man) to your solution.
trans-unit.target: This property page is available if you add a message text file (.mc) or a manifest (.man) to your solution.

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional options to pass to the Message Compiler (MC.exe) tool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies additional options to pass to the Message Compiler (MC.exe) tool.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the input file contains ANSI content (this is the default).
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the input file contains ANSI content (this is the default).

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the messages in the output .bin file should be ANSI.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the messages in the output .bin file should be ANSI.

trans-unit.source: The path must point to the folder that contains the .BIN files that the baseline operation created.
trans-unit.target: The path must point to the folder that contains the .BIN files that the baseline operation created.

trans-unit.source: The folder which contains the baseline manifest files.
trans-unit.target: The folder which contains the baseline manifest files.

trans-unit.source: The path in which to place the .dbg C include file.
trans-unit.target: The path in which to place the .dbg C include file.

trans-unit.source: Adds a callout macro to invoke user code at logging.
trans-unit.target: Adds a callout macro to invoke user code at logging.

trans-unit.source: Not available for C#, and ignored.
trans-unit.target: Not available for C#, and ignored.

trans-unit.source: Enables the compiler to place the .dbg C include file specified by the Debug Output Path property.
trans-unit.target: Enables the compiler to place the .dbg C include file specified by the Debug Output Path property.

trans-unit.source: File extension for the generated header
trans-unit.target: File extension for the generated header

trans-unit.source: Specifies the extension of the generated header file.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the extension of the generated header file.

trans-unit.source: Creates a baseline of your instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: Creates a baseline of your instrumentation.

trans-unit.source: Generates a C# (managed) logging class that includes methods that you would call to log events in your manifest.
trans-unit.target: Generates a C# (managed) logging class that includes methods that you would call to log events in your manifest.

trans-unit.source: Generate header file for containing counter names and GUIDs
trans-unit.target: Generate header file for containing counter names and GUIDs

trans-unit.source: Use this option to specify the folder into which you want the compiler to place the generated header file.
trans-unit.target: Use this option to specify the folder into which you want the compiler to place the generated header file.

trans-unit.source: Generate down-level support for all functions and macros generated.
trans-unit.target: Generate down-level support for all functions and macros generated.

trans-unit.source: MOF file will be generated from the manifest.
trans-unit.target: MOF file will be generated from the manifest.

trans-unit.source: MOF file will be placed in the location specified by the -h option (-mof).
trans-unit.target: MOF file will be placed in the location specified by the -h option (-mof).

trans-unit.source: Generates a static C# (managed) logging class that includes methods that you would call to log events in your manifest.
trans-unit.target: Generates a static C# (managed) logging class that includes methods that you would call to log events in your manifest.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the base name of all generated files.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the base name of all generated files.

trans-unit.source: Generated RC and Binary Message Files Path
trans-unit.target: Generated RC and Binary Message Files Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the generated the RC and binary message files.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the path to the generated the RC and binary message files.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path the generated header file.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the path the generated header file.

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to have the compiler generate a warning if any message exceeds length characters.
trans-unit.target: Use this argument to have the compiler generate a warning if any message exceeds length characters.

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to override the default prefix that the compiler uses for the logging macro names and method names.
trans-unit.target: Use this argument to override the default prefix that the compiler uses for the logging macro names and method names.

trans-unit.source: The folder into which you want the compiler to place the generated resource compiler script (.rc file) and the generated .bin files.
trans-unit.target: The folder into which you want the compiler to place the generated resource compiler script (.rc file) and the generated .bin files.

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to remove characters from the beginning of the symbolic name that you specified for the event.
trans-unit.target: Use this argument to remove characters from the beginning of the symbolic name that you specified for the event.

trans-unit.source: Sets the Customer bit in the entire message Ids.
trans-unit.target: Sets the Customer bit in the entire message Ids.

trans-unit.source: Terminates all strings with nulls in the message tables.
trans-unit.target: Terminates all strings with nulls in the message tables.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the input file contains Unicode content.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the input file contains Unicode content.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the messages in the output .bin file are Unicode.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the messages in the output .bin file are Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to have the compiler use the base name of the input file for the name of the output .bin files.
trans-unit.target: Use this argument to have the compiler use the base name of the input file for the name of the output .bin files.

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to use decimal values for the Severity and Facility constants in the header file instead of hexadecimal values.
trans-unit.target: Use this argument to use decimal values for the Severity and Facility constants in the header file instead of hexadecimal values.

trans-unit.source: Use this argument when you create a new version of your manifest and want to check it for application compatibility against the baseline that you created using the -s option.
trans-unit.target: Use this argument when you create a new version of your manifest and want to check it for application compatibility against the baseline that you created using the -s option.

trans-unit.source: Use this option to generate verbose output.
trans-unit.target: Use this option to generate verbose output.

trans-unit.source: [WDK and Visual Studio build environment](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh454286) Message compiler task
trans-unit.target: [WDK and Visual Studio build environment](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh454286) Message compiler task
